uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

cable_length_in_meters.description: Cable Length or Distance to Fault in meters. If the length is 'unknown', this param is displayed as null.

pair_skew_in_nano_sec.description: Pair Skew. Not applicable for copper ports.

pair_polarity.description: Pair Polarity. Not applicable for copper ports.

mdi_mode.description: MDI Mode. Not applicable for copper ports.
